snippet.title: TRIALS® RISING - CRASH & SUNBURN TRAILER
snippet.description:
Trials® Rising Crash & Sunburn is out!
 Trials® Rising Crash & Sunburn takes you below the Equator to see the wonders of the Southern Hemisphere! Enjoy 2 additional fun bikes, ride your way through mountains, jungles, and more!
 
 Visit our official channels for the latest info on Trials Rising: 
 https://trialsgame.com
 https://www.facebook.com/trials.official
 https://twitter.com/TrialsGames
 http://www.youtube.com/Ubisoft
